channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 加拿大将恢复对许多来自墨西哥的旅客的签证要求，以阻止大量寻求庇护者涌入机场
item.description:

item.title: 本周三，比特币两年多来首次突破 60,000 美元，今年以来已累计上涨约 40%：晚间简报
item.description:
Bitcoin pushed past $60,000 for the first time in more than two years on Wednesday and has jumped about 40% already this year: Here’s your Evening Briefing https://t.co/RexMHvEc4P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 即使政府做出了多年来最有力的重振市场的尝试，香港的房地产行业仍面临着一场艰苦的战斗

item.title: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司加入了看跌瑞士法郎的投资者阵营，因为通胀放缓使得瑞士央行不再需要支撑瑞士法郎。
item.description:
Europe’s biggest asset manager is joining a chorus of investors who are turning bearish on Switzerland’s franc after slowing inflation has eliminated the need for the central bank to prop up the currency https://t.co/FZH4ZnZFVc

item.title: 巴西最大财富之一的家族办公室聘请了前摩根士丹利货币交易员 Thiago Melzer
item.description:
The family office for one of Brazil’s largest fortunes has hired former Morgan Stanley currency trader Thiago Melzer https://t.co/vZGRkXXiFD

item.title: EA 首席执行官在一份备忘录中告诉员工，EA 将裁员 5%，约 670 人，理由是客户需求的变化和公司重心的调整。
item.description:
Electronic Arts said it’s cutting 5% of its workforce, or about 670 people, citing shifting customer needs and a refocusing of the company.
EA will also be ceasing development on an undisclosed number of video games, the CEO told staff in a memo https://t.co/s7iLZuleQv pic.twitter.com/h9eTSMugNI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 比特币升破 60,000 美元，IFM 押注可持续航空燃料，必和必拓裁员。阅读今天的澳大利亚简报，了解彭博社从澳大利亚和世界各地为您提供的最新资讯。
item.description:

item.title: 米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）即将卸任参议院共和党领袖一职，这将引发一场激烈的接班人争夺战，同时也将决定这个目前由唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）主导的政党的走向。
item.description:
Mitch McConnell pending exit as Senate Republican leader sets up a fierce succession battle that also will determine the direction of a party now dominated by Donald Trump https://t.co/2MgwCF737H

item.title: 作为与纽约金融服务局达成的和解的一部分，Gemini 将向 Genesis Global Capital 破产案的客户返还至少 11 亿美元。

item.title: 意大利工业部长阿道夫-乌尔索（Adolfo Urso）在议会听证会上表示，意大利与特斯拉和其他汽车制造商就在本国生产汽车一事进行了讨论

item.title: 在线经纪商平台 Webull 在同意 SPAC 上市交易之前，已经抛掉了加密货币风险敞口，使其预估企业价值达到约 73 亿美元。
item.description:
Online broker platform Webull shed its crypto exposure ahead of agreeing a SPAC deal to go public, giving it a pro forma enterprise value of about $7.3 billion. https://t.co/HCNBpgcNEp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 三位美联储官员表示，降息步伐将取决于经济数据，这表明降低借贷成本的路径可能与过去的周期不同
item.description:
Three Fed officials said the pace of rate cuts will depend on economic data, suggesting the path to lower borrowing costs may look different than in past cycles https://t.co/G0qOTQLs6e

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普提出购买格陵兰岛是有原因的，但不是为了拯救北极熊

item.title: 一位曾领导政府起诉 "无炸弹人 "的前联邦检察官被任命领导对 FTX 及其破产律师事务所的新调查。

item.title: 随着对黄金地段的需求升温，一个投资房地产数十年的纽约家族正在出售其在曼哈顿的建筑组合。

item.title: Burford Capital 盯上了阿根廷与中国的货币互换额度，因为它正试图收回美国法院就 YPF 石油公司国有化问题做出的 160 亿美元判决。
item.description:
Burford Capital is eyeing Argentina’s currency swap line with China as it tries to collect on a $16 billion US court judgment over the nationalization of oil company YPF https://t.co/SAmbUmIBW8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 非洲三分之一的国家将在今年选出新政府，希望借此减少冲突、刺激经济增长并促进非洲大陆的就业设置提醒#ThePoliticsSpace ⤵️
item.description:
A third of Africa’s nations will choose new governments this year, with the hopes of reducing conflict, spurring economic growth and boosting employment on the continent

Set a reminder for #ThePoliticsSpace ⤵️https://t.co/uPD9XYkqRu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024
